alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland; Hocking; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 03 at 11:23AM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing continuing. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of two tenths to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Central, South Central and Southwest Ohio and Northeast and Northern Kentucky. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will likely fall to near or below zero degrees Friday night into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
